text: Kirill Gevorgian (Russian: Кирилл Геворгян; born 8 April 1953) is a Russian diplomat and jurist. From 2003 to 2009, he served as Russia's ambassador to the Netherlands. In 2014, he was elected to the International Court of Justice for a term beginning the following year. ==External links== *Curriculum Vitae (page 50) Category:International Court of Justice judges Category:Russian judges Category:Living people Category:People from Moscow Category:1953 births Category:Ambassadors of Russia to the Netherlands Category:International Law Commission officials Category:Russian people of Armenian descent Category:Russian judges of United Nations courts and tribunals
title: Kirill Gevorgian
